tr.td: The string representing the body match specified in a remote.http check. (ex: "<!doctype html><html><head><meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; c")
The number of bytes returned from a response payload. (ex: 10577)
The absolute timestamp in seconds for the certificate expiration. This is only available performing a check on an HTTPS server. (ex: 1324252799)
The relative timestamp in seconds til certification expiration. This is only available performing a check on an HTTPS server. (ex: 4003810)
A string describing a certificate error in our validation. This is only available performing a check on an HTTPS server. (ex: "certificate not trusted")
The issue string for the certificate. This is only available performing a check on an HTTPS server. (ex: "/C=ZA/O=Thawte Consulting (Pty) Ltd./CN=Thawte SGC CA")
The absolute timestamp of the issue of the certificate. This is only available performing a check on an HTTPS server. (ex: 1261094400)
The subject of the certificate. This is only available performing a check on an HTTPS server. (ex: "/C=US/ST=California/L=Mountain View/O=Google Inc/CN=www.google.com")
The time took to finish executing the check in milliseconds. (ex: 237)
The time to connect measured in milliseconds. (ex: 50)
The time to first byte measured in milliseconds. (ex: 237)
